summary: In 2005, 20-year-old Ryan Ferguson was convicted and sentenced to 40 years in prison for a crime he did not commit, causing his father, Bill, to embark on a 10-year campaign to prove Ryan's innocence.
cast: Kevin Crane|Chuck Erickson|Bill Ferguson|Leslie Ferguson|Ryan Ferguson|Kent Heitholt|Dallas Mallory|Cynthia Martin|Erin Moriarty|Shawna Ornt|Charlie Rogers|Ellen Roper|Jerry Trump|Kathleen Zellner
title: Dream/Killer
